TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NavigationFailedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些事件引數包含巡覽失敗，並會傳遞至處理常式的相關資訊**NavigationFailed**事件，這由下列實作：These event arguments contain information about a navigation that failed, and are passed to handlers of the **NavigationFailed** event, which is implemented by the following: - - - - 封裝失敗之巡覽要求的下列詳細資料： encapsulates the following details of the failed navigation request: - **瀏覽起始**: 。**Navigation Initiation**: . - **巡覽的例外狀況**: ， 。**Navigation Exception**: , . - **瀏覽內容**: 。**Navigation Content**: . - **瀏覽詳細資料**: ， 。**Navigation Details**: , . - **瀏覽狀態**: 。**Navigation State**: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您處理不要因為失敗之巡覽，也會擲回的例外狀況的處理序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]若要繼續處理的例外狀況，您應該設定屬性設`true`。When you handle to process an exception that is thrown as a result of a failed navigation, and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to continue processing the exception, you should set the property to `true`.

summary.span: 取得用來要求指定內容的 Web 要求。

span.span: Gets the web request that was used to request the specified content.

value.span: 取得用來要求指定內容的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object that was used to request the specified content.

value.span: 如果巡覽至物件，則 為 。

span.span: If navigating to an object, is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象基底類別會封裝 web 要求，且不限通訊協定。 is an abstract base class that encapsulates a web request, and is protocol agnostic. 每個常用的通訊協定，.NET Framework 包含的類別，衍生自並將它擴充使用通訊協定特定的狀態和行為，包括：For each common protocol, the .NET Framework includes a class that derives from and extends it with protocol-specific state and behavior, including: - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`pack://`配置要求應用程式資料檔案 (請參閱[WPF 應用程式資源、 內容和資料檔案](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`http://`配置要求的檔案從 Web 伺服器。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers. - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`ftp://`配置要求的檔案從 FTP 伺服器。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers. - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`file://`配置要求的本機檔案。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.

value.span: 嘗試下載要求的指定內容之後所傳回的 。

span.span: The that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是封裝 web 回應的抽象基底類別，而且不限通訊協定。 is an abstract base class that encapsulates a web response, and is protocol agnostic. 每個常用的通訊協定，.NET Framework 包含的類別，衍生自和擴充，這些通訊協定專屬的狀態，包括：For each common protocol, the .NET Framework includes a class that derives from and extends it with protocol-specific state, including: - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`pack://`配置要求應用程式資料檔案 (請參閱[WPF 應用程式資源、 內容和資料檔案](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`http://`配置要求的檔案從 Web 伺服器。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers. - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`ftp://`配置要求的檔案從 FTP 伺服器。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers. - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`file://`配置要求的本機檔案。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
